headline.print_headline: Bradley Says No Satisfaction Yet for US WCup Team
headline.main: Bradley Says No Satisfaction Yet for US WCup Team

docs.snippet: Maybe this is a sign the U.S. national team has matured: While much of America celebrated advancement to the World Cup knockout stage, Michael Bradley thinks the accomplishment has to be viewed with perspective....

headline.print_headline: Iraq Forces Launch Push for Insurgent-Held City
headline.main: Iraq Forces Launch Push for Insurgent-Held City

docs.snippet: The Iraqi government launched its biggest push yet to wrest back ground lost to Sunni militants, as soldiers backed by tanks and helicopter gunships began an offensive Saturday to retake the northern city of Tikrit....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Iraqi government launched its biggest push yet to wrest back ground lost to Sunni militants, as soldiers backed by tanks and helicopter gunships began an offensive Saturday to retake the northern city of Tikrit.

headline.print_headline: Mars 'Flying Saucer' Splashes Down After NASA Test
headline.main: Mars 'Flying Saucer' Splashes Down After NASA Test

docs.snippet: A saucer-shaped NASA vehicle testing new technology for Mars landings rocketed high over the Pacific on Saturday and deployed a novel inflatable braking system, but its massive parachute failed to fully unfurl as it descended to a splashdown....
docs.lead_paragraph: A saucer-shaped NASA vehicle testing new technology for Mars landings rocketed high over the Pacific on Saturday and deployed a novel inflatable braking system, but its massive parachute failed to fully unfurl as it descended to a splashdown.

headline.print_headline: A Look at What's Next in Hawaii Death Penalty Case
headline.main: A Look at What's Next in Hawaii Death Penalty Case

docs.snippet: In an announcement Friday, a federal jury said it was unable to reach a consensus on whether a former soldier should be executed for killing his young daughter in Hawaii, which doesn't have the death penalty....

headline.print_headline: Hawaii Juror Favored Death for Ex-Soldier, 8-4
headline.main: Hawaii Juror Favored Death for Ex-Soldier, 8-4

docs.snippet: Jurors who decided the fate of a former soldier convicted of killing his 5-year-old daughter said their labored deliberations ended with eight of them wanting him sentenced to death and four of them wanting him to spend the rest of his life in pri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jurors who decided the fate of a former soldier convicted of killing his 5-year-old daughter said their labored deliberations ended with eight of them wanting him sentenced to death and four of them wanting him to spend the rest of his life in prison.

headline.print_headline: Tears, Joy at Vote to Fund Bridge Suicide Barrier
headline.main: Tears, Joy at Vote to Fund Bridge Suicide Barrier

docs.snippet: A teary-eyed Dana Barks was almost speechless after officials for the San Francisco's iconic Golden Gate Bridge approved a $76 million funding package for a suicide barrier that could prevent people from jumping to their deaths....
docs.lead_paragraph: A teary-eyed Dana Barks was almost speechless after officials for the San Francisco's iconic Golden Gate Bridge approved a $76 million funding package for a suicide barrier that could prevent people from jumping to their deaths.

headline.print_headline: BoE's Carney Says Sterling Should Settle Over Time
headline.main: BoE's Carney Says Sterling Should Settle Over Time

docs.snippet: The recent strength of the British pound reflects the relative strength of the economy and should settle over time, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney was quoted as saying in an interview on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The recent strength of the British pound reflects the relative strength of the economy and should settle over time, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney was quoted as saying in an interview on Saturday.
